name: Goodbye, Oliver
description:
Goodbye, Oliver is my second ever game jam submission and my first attempt at an isometric style game. It is a peaceful but melancholy game about recovering memories of a child's deceased dog, Oliver. 

The game involves finding memory locations in the ghost world and then recovering those memories in the real world. 

Be warned, tread carefully in the ghost world and don't spend too long there else you risk being lost forever.

Programming and game design by me.
